StoryText: I wake up late and now I am going to have to rush in order to get to work on time so that my boss isn't upset with me. But I am hungry too.
Question: What should I do?

OptionText.Text: Have my usual coffee and breakfast before work.
Skip my morning routine rush and try to stop off for a coffee on my way to work.
Skip my morning routine, rush, stop off for a breakfast sandwich before work.

OptionResult.Result: I do my usual routine, have my coffee and healthy breakfast that prepares me for the day. %FullName:NPC:1% is mad at me for being late but I still manage to be productive.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% is pretty mad at me for being late, but I just wanted to still make the healthy choice and eat my usual breakfast and not skip a meal or anything. I'm still really productive at work, not that %FullName:NPC:1% cares.

OptionResult.Result: I get a coffee before work and actually end up getting to work early what with all the rushing. My boss is happy to see me arrive early, but I feel so weak having skipped breakfast.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: The coffee is really strong and keeps me awake and allows me to be productive and %FullName:NPC:1% is happy I am early. But I am feeling weaker and weaker as the day goes on and just waiting for lunch. I'm starving!

OptionResult.Result: I stop and get a breakfast sandwich and manage to make it to work early with all the rushing. At least I ate something but this sandwich is so heavy and now I'm tired and slow.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% is happy I arrived early but I don't know of how much use I'll be. I rushed to get ready, had no coffee, skipped my morning routine and had a fatty and heavy breakfast sandwich. This day can't END soon enough.
